title: The Malawi Republic Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-malawi-republic-act | Legal areas: International Relations

provisions.title: Section 2
Section 3
provisions.content:
3.-(1) On and after the commencement of this Act, OpcFtipn    of existing
all existing law, that is to say all law which, whether being law.
a rule of law or a provision of an Act of Parliament or of
any other enactment or instrument whatsoever, is in force
on the date of such commencement or has been passed or
made before that date and comes into force thereafter, shall,
unless and until provision to the contrary is made by
Parliament or some other authority having power in that
behalf, and subject to the following provisions of this section,
have the same operatidn in relation to Malawi, and persons
and things belonging to or connected with Malawi, as it
would have apart from this subsection if Malawi, had not
become a Republic.
       (2) The Minister may, by order, make such adapta-
tions in any enactment passed before or after the commence-
ment of this Act, or in any instrument having effect under
any such enactment, as appear to him necessary or expedi-
ent in consequence of Malawi having become a Republic;
2                         MALAWI REPUBLIC
    and any such order may, though made after the commence-
    ment of this Act, be made so as to have effect from the
    date of such commencement.
          (3) Every order made under subsection (2) shall be
    subject to negative resolution.
